pgrid.core.search
Class RemoteSearchHandler

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.search.RemoteSearchHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchListener, RemoteMessageHandler
public class RemoteSearchHandler
extends Object
implements SearchListener, RemoteMessageHandler

This class processes search requests. NOTE: The name is missleading since this class will also take care of local search.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

          Creates a new RemoteSearchHandler.

failedToRoute

public void failedToRoute(PGridMessage msg)
This method is called when the router is unable to route further a message. The routing behavior is left to the application layer.
